content: a simple ribbed chunky crochet beanie that works up fast and has a modern knit-like look this easy crochet beanie comes in 8 sizes ranging from preemie baby all the way to adult large this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial  sizes preemie baby toddler child tween adult small adult large skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns ** here 1 ** sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
